00017 void CHuffman::readDictionary( byte *p_exedata, unsigned long offset)
00018 {
00019  p_exedata += offset;
00020  memcpy(m_nodes, p_exedata,255*sizeof(nodestruct));
00021 }
00022 
00023 /* Expand huffman-compressed input file into output buffer */
00024 void CHuffman::expand(byte *pin, byte *pout, unsigned long inlen, unsigned long outlen)
00025 {
00026  unsigned short curnode;
00027  unsigned long incnt = 0, outcnt = 0;
00028  unsigned char c, mask;
00029  unsigned short nextnode;
00030 
00031  curnode = 254; /* Head node */
00032 
00033  do
00034  {
00035   mask = 1;
00036   c = *(pin++);
00037   incnt++;
00038 
00039   do
00040   {
00041    if(c & mask)
00042     nextnode = m_nodes[curnode].bit1;
00043    else
00044     nextnode = m_nodes[curnode].bit0;
00045 
00046 
00047    if(nextnode < 256)
00048    {
00049     /* output a char and move back to the head node */
00050     *(pout++) = nextnode;
00051     outcnt++;
00052     curnode = 254;
00053    }
00054    else
00055    {
00056     /* move to the next node */
00057     curnode = nextnode & 0xFF;
00058    }
00059    /* Move to consider the next bit */
00060    mask <<= 1;
00061   }
00062   while(outcnt < outlen && mask != 0);
00063 
00064  }
00065  while(incnt < inlen && outcnt < outlen);
00066 }
